entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of rain or snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to light snow before morning. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Light snow. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
